name: Auto Glad
description:
Are you not entertained?

Take control of the gladiators in this brutal auto-battler rogue-like with a charming old-school look. Defeat your opponents and reach the boss!

YIELD TO YOUR ENEMIES! (Failure is Progress)

Yield to your enemy at any time and continue your run as them! Just make sure you yield before your gladiator is killed!

Four enemy types, four different weapons, and a boss to defeat!

Artwork by Tom (thanks Tom).

Have fun!
